## Correlation Analysis

```{r, include=FALSE}
consolidated_SA <- left_join(SA_2Yr, 
                          VIX %>% filter(Name=="VXEEM", date>ymd(20120506)) %>% spread(Name, Price),
                          by="date") %>%
    left_join(., SA_bonds %>% arrange(date) %>% select(date, ZA_10Yr) %>% filter(date>ymd(20120506)),
              by="date") %>% 
    left_join(., BE_Infl %>% spread(Name, Price), by="date") %>%
    left_join(., usdzar %>% spread(Name, Price) %>% rename("USDZAR"= SouthAfrica_Cncy) %>% filter(date>ymd(20120506)), by="date")


M <- consolidated_SA %>% select(-date)
M1 <- cor(M)


cor.mtest <- function(mat, ...) {
 mat <- as.matrix(mat)
n <- ncol(mat)
p.mat<- matrix(NA, n, n)
diag(p.mat) <- 0
for (i in 1:(n - 1)) {
     for (j in (i + 1):n) {
         tmp <- cor.test(mat[, i], mat[, j], ...)
           p.mat[i, j] <- p.mat[j, i] <- tmp$p.value
       }
   }
   colnames(p.mat) <- rownames(p.mat) <- colnames(mat)
   p.mat
 }
p.mat <- cor.mtest(M)

corrplot(M1, type="lower", order="hclust")

cor1 <- cor.test(consolidated_SA$ZA_2Yr, consolidated_SA$SAGGBE10, method="pearson")
cor2 <- cor.test(consolidated_SA$ZA_10Yr, consolidated_SA$USDZAR, method="pearson")

```

```{r}

corrplot(M1, type="lower", order="hclust",  p.mat = p.mat, sig.level = 0.01, insig = "blank")

```

Correlation between Break-Even inflation (SAGGBE10) and Medium term (2Yr) bond yields significant(p-value=`r cor1$p.value`) and positive (`r cor1$estimate`). 
Correlation between the USDZAR exchange rate and Long term (10Yr) bond yields significant (p-value=`r cor2$p.value`) and positive (`r cor2$estimate`.

```{r}

consolidated_SA %>% select(date, ZA_10Yr, USDZAR) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=USDZAR, y=ZA_10Yr)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method=lm) +fmxdat::theme_fmx() + fmxdat::fmx_cols()

```

```{r}

consolidated_SA %>% select(date, ZA_2Yr, SAGGBE10) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=SAGGBE10, y=ZA_2Yr)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method=lm) +fmxdat::theme_fmx() + fmxdat::fmx_cols()

```
